document.title: OMBI-Dutch-Indonesian
document.intro: OMBI-Dutch-Indonesian is a reversible bilingual lexical file (in Dutch, OMBI, omkeerbare bilinguale bestanden) in which Dutch is the source language and Indonesian the target language. OMBI- Dutch-Indonesian can be used in computational ap... OMBI is a tool for creating and editing bilingual dictionaries The OMBI bilingual resources have been developed by order of and under the auspices of the CLVV (Commissie voor Lexicografische Vertaalvoorzieningen), which was established by the Ministers of Education of both the Netherlands and Flanders in 1993. The chairman of the CLVV was Willy Mar... OMBI-Dutch-Indonesian contains 50.000 entries.

access.title: available for non-commercial and commercial organisations; user license required
